root.language:
Jiangshi Necrotic Touch Haunt Detect Breath Chi Drain Horrific Song Frightful Leap Horrid Reminder Move
Necrotic Touch Haunt Detect Breath Chi Drain Horrific Song Frightful Leap Horrid Reminder
The dead should not leave their graves... I refuse to travel with that wicked thing! I will not serve with this... creature. Bah, in the end only the strong will be saved. Those crosses hurt my head. Rid the priest and it will become like home. And share all those innocent lives with you? Never. This is MY cattle. Find your own herd! I am the true master! I don't intend on treating you as an equal...
Decayed Hand Regenerated Hand Monstrous Hand Sharpend Claws "Bloodletter" Jiangshi's Claws Ruined Talisman Sub-par Talisman Mended Talisman Unfinished Talisman "Emperor Rescript: Comply & Live" Jiangshi Talisman
The Jiangshi is a undead creature capable of destruction of defences; though technically blind she is able to detect her prey by their breath, allowing her to drain her prey's very own lifeforce. The jiangshi uses her claws to rip into enemies, allowing her breach even the strongest armour: while having the guise of a young woman she can catch enemies off gaurd with her frightful apperence. The jiangshi defaults to what was her original personality, tending her musical talent to calm her new found "friends" or creating talismans to help, though she tends to wander off at night.
Well I be able to rest? Huh... Whats wrong?
Time for sleep. How long have I been awake? I don't remember when I last slept.
I go with a clear mind!
Did it do something? What do you mean, I killed him?! I don't think that effects me? I like dancing. How odd I remember a face.
So far from home... My joints are stiffening... I don'tt like the sun much anymore...
Did I do good? Found you! I am hungry! BOO! I..I..am sorry! Wait, what am I doing? This isn't me! ...
Please I don't want to left alone! You are on his side aren't you! Stay away from my brother! You think you can trick me again!
GO AHEAD AND TRY! I CAN'T FEEL ANYTHING, LET ME FEEL YOUR PAIN! Your screams well be part of my dance!
Why did I even bother accepting the invitation! Let me guess you're scared? ...Bunch of dummies...
This is my dance, no yours. NO NO NO, MY BROTHER IS MINE!. Who told you to change the music?! You follow my lead.
Did he miss me that much... Please...This isn't me! I am not amonster, I am not like this! What happened to me.
I DANCED AGAINST 1000 SHARKS ONCE! Lets see what we can do when we move like sticks. Oh happy days, the emperor is here! Let me see that dog!
Come on! We are just starting! We can't stop now, they are starting to fall back! I am dancer not a fighter, but first time for everything! I never leave a perfomence unfinished!
I have performed infront of nobles, what makes you think I'd run away! He wouldn't run and neither shall I! The show has just begun! Rough crowd...y
Just let the music guide ya! This is a group performance everybody. Let the rhythm guide you, until you perform under the moonlight. You can here the music too, then lets continue.
That was just a warm up the real starts now! I will take my bow when I am finished.
I will lead you to victory, as in the old days. I will lead you to victory, as in the old days. I will lead you to victory, as in the old days. I will lead you to victory, as in the old days.
You can't kill me! I am eternal! Worse things I have unlived... Do not fear the darkness, for it is our ally. Bear up, fight with courage or you will know my anger! At my order... ATTACK! I will rip the flesh off their bones! Hah! They just pierced one of my lungs, and yet I felt nothing! I have a pike that bears your name... A monster. I am a monster! I used to be a noble. What have I done? What a sick joke, that I should bear this curse and not be granted the mercy of death. The dawn is near to arrive, I must return! The light has abandoned me, and you with it! The damn Light! There is too much light! See how blood does not come from my wounds! Finish this damn existence! I'm just a shell full of misery Shut your traps and OBEY! I am surrounded by idiots. Really?... And why should I care about your opinion? Teaming up with you lot was a mistake! Things must be done my way! I will do what I consider convenient for myself Is... Is that garlic? That symbol, it burns! It freezes! That crack in the wall! The dawn is coming! And death will be covered with glory the glory of our bodies! Let the darkness flood everything... I will be the father of your rebirth! Get that symbol away from me! Is that a crucifix?... ARGHHHHHH!! They stink of garlic! I will not turn my back to you... I know your intentions al too well!]></entry> <entry id="jiangshi+str_change_pos_back_paranoid"> <![CDATA[I will not fall in your trap. Leave it to me! Death calls me to duty! I want something that makes me feel alive! Death hides from me! I can hear the voices of those whose lives I snatched. And the seas will be dyed in red... No, it can't be... Why are we fighting? This makes no sense! I'm just a shadow for the world... I will have your head! Allow me to Oh, who are we kidding. It is pointless to attack me. This is no place for me. I am the one who commands here! Do I have to show you how to do everything? You are the ones who should do the dirty work! I will not risk myself for you. Take my place. You are expendable, after all. This thirst burns me inside! Life escapes from this hollow bones... I feel weak and old ... Now I see it clearly, you are the enemy! Follwing your orders will lead us all to destruction! Wait... Why am I paying attention to you? I said NO! Who are you to give orders to me? Silence. I will do as I please. Kill each other, I will enjoy the show. The deep red of the blood is so ... hypnotic. Let me enjoy the scent of death. My powers have abandoned me! My destiny is not among you! The darkness envelops us between shrieks of madness! You won't be the one to tell me what to do! I will take the initiative! I won't let myself be guided by traitors! I've been longing for my end! Come on! Hurt me if you can! There will be no redemption for me! Contemplate the true power of darkness! Keep your pitiful advice for those who need it! Your lack of decision has brought us nothing but disgrace! None of these vermin are worthy rivals. I am my own leader! Shut up and watch how it's done! The value of the battle is measured in bloodshed. I want to hear you scream! I'll gut you like a fish! SHHHH ... Silence! I've lived this before ... and I know how it ends. Do you really think that I have believed your intentions? I will know what to do... Maybe you are more useful as food than as companions. Go ahead ... rest ... I will watch you closely. Any of your lives could quench my thirst. I refuse to sleep, lest I wake up pierced by wood. Do not even think about praying. I can hear you. You are no better than the rats we have left behind us. Give me a reason why I shouldn't end you here and now. I am destined to guide you to an accurate death. Being on my side has condemned you all. This mission will take us all to hell! Are you going to continue saying such idiocies? Why do not you do us a favor by cutting out your tongue? Last night I met a wonderful and elegant girl. I think she will be buried tomorrow. Go ahead, rest. Hopefully you will not wake up. It seems that enduring you is another hellish punishment... I'm surrounded by idiots... It's obvious that you aren`t up to the task. Don't bother healing that wound, in the end we'll have to amputate. The ji_drain_chirs looks at you with hungry eyes ... I understand why Please, don't bother to suppress your agony. There is no hope... for you. We are guided by a moon dyed red! I could cut my veins and they would only sprout dust Come on! Come to me! Pierce this lifeless heart! It's been long since the last time I felt pain... Dare to face me! I can see the end of the tunnel... Serve all to the EVERLASTING MASTER! Don't get close to me! We are here because of your fault! You will learn to do things well... Death will be more useful to us! I know your mission is to end me! Your voice will join the ones of those I have left behind! You are no more than cattle! I shall feast on you! I'm just a shell full of misery I want something that makes me feel alive! Contemplate my entrails! There is no pleasure sweeter than the agony itself Only pain will make us free! I am my own enemy! There is no hope for you cowards! Where do you think you're going? ...When the best part starts? You have not suffered enough yet ... If I fall, you will fall with me! We are not going anywhere. Don't resist the embrace of the darkness. The sun sets for us all. I can't stand this famine! Hunger devours me inside! The guilt rests on me! Don't worry, I can do your dirty work... Is this what you wanted? Let me show you how it's done... I don't need anyone's help to die! Let death embrace me! YAAAAARGH!! Let the darkness flood everything... The smell of your soul is so...distracting. Before, I need to feed. I don't intend to give you that satisfaction. I don't have it very clear... There's no life left within this body! I don't care... I'm just a shadow for the world... The die is cast...for you. You will die if it ensures my safety! I don't intend to die because of your stupidity! I'll teach you how to do things right, CUR. You deserve a correction for your mistakes! Crawl to my feet, mortal! Let your soul serve me! You are too weak for this! The force abandons you! I know your intentions... traitor You are the real enemy... HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Carrying on with you is a monstrous existence. You should have stayed in your cave... As expected... There is no glory for those who don't serve me. Only I will get rid of worms and flies. that's the energy I need to ingest! Share your life force with me! Hmm...pure theater It shows my influence... Let the blood run... Really? Come on, it's just a scratch. Your pained gesture is quite amusing. No head will remain on those shoulders. This is the beginning of the end. You will be more useful as sustenance for immortals! So much combat is opening my appetite. You should have left it to me! Hmm... easy. The moon will swallow the sun ... forever. I have rats in my throat! Wherever you go ... I have my eyes on you. Please, let me smell you more closely. Won't you think to escape? Erase that from your mind. Don't avoid the pain! (sadistic and threatening smile) (intense and threatening gaze) Stay, you miserable wretch! Wherever you go, your shadow will not stop chasing you. It's fun to see you running like a beaten dog. Won't you be consecrated? I know you're looking for a crucifix, you traitor! It won't be necessary. That won't save you from my hunger. That will not prevent your agony, nor my pleasure. Your expression reminds me of how the pain felt. Do not put your faith in those trinkets of trickery. Nothing will prevent you from ending up as food for the vermin. Move that light away from me! Do you intend for me to embrace your parlor tricks? I'm not going to trust you, or your cheap tricks. Let me enjoy the agony... I don't need your help. Hah. Think again. You can't heal that which is already dead. Calm, I've already died other times... I don't need the bowels inside to fight. That light burns me like the sun ... turn it off! Focus your tricks on those who need them. Nothing will prevent the flesh from falling off my bones. I won't let you get close to me! I know that your intention is not to help me. Put your hands where I can see them, miserable worm! There's no life left within this body. I've been longing for my end. Let me alone with my pain... Seriously, I'm enjoying this. My strength comes only from the pain of my enemies. I will face them with my naked claws. There is no rat that can defend the wolf. (awkward silence) Exactly... what are you trying to do?.
{colour_start|debuff}Steal {colour_end}2 pts max HP {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(3 Battles){colour_end} {colour_start|debuff}Steal {colour_end}2 pts max HP {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(3 Battles){colour_end} {colour_start|debuff}Steal {colour_end}3 pts max HP {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(3 Battles){colour_end} {colour_start|debuff}Steal {colour_end}3 pts max HP {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(3 Battles){colour_end} {colour_start|debuff}Steal {colour_end}4 pts max HP {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(3 Battles){colour_end}
40%% {colour_start|healhp}Lifesteal{colour_end} 45%% {colour_start|healhp}Lifesteal{colour_end} 50%% {colour_start|healhp}Lifesteal{colour_end} 55%% {colour_start|healhp}Lifesteal{colour_end} 60%% {colour_start|healhp}Lifesteal{colour_end}
{colour_start|debuff}Debuff{colour_end}: -2 SPD, -10%% Prot, -10%% DMG
